title: VMC (Membership Credential)

member.description: DID of the member node being enrolled.

memberOf.description: DID of the VTC/VTN the member belongs to.

membershipRole.description: Role of the member within the trust community/network.

effectiveFrom.description: RFC3339 timestamp when this membership becomes effective.

effectiveUntil.description: RFC3339 timestamp when this membership expires (optional).

governanceReference.description: Reference to governance/policy governing this membership (DID or URI).

description: Establishes a node in the DTG by defining membership in a VTC or VTN.
